tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE campaign_performance_data (
  id INT,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  reach INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
)
CREATE TABLE reach (reach_id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, impressions INT, clicks INT)
CREATE TABLE clicks (click_id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, source VARCHAR(255), clicks INT)
CREATE TABLE conversions (conversion_id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, source VARCHAR(255), conversions INT)
CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, reach_id INT, click_id INT, conversion_id INT)

CREATE TABLE Performance ( 
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL, 
    impressions INT NOT NULL, 
    clicks INT NOT NULL, 
    conversions INT NOT NULL 
);
